newsitem.title: USA: Westinghouse says not selling CBS.
newsitem.headline: Westinghouse says not selling CBS.

text.p: Westinghouse Electric Corp said Tuesday there was no truth to rumors it was selling its CBS unit.

"...In light of the recent trading activity, the company stated that there is no truth to the unattributed rumor reported in today's New York Post speculating on the possible sale of CBS, nor is any party examining our financial books as reported by the Post," Westinghouse said in a statement.
"Our intention is to build CBS into the preeminent media company in the industry, not to sell it," Westinghouse said.
The Post reported today that Microsoft Corp was reviewing the finances of CBS and was considering making a bid for the network.
Microsoft officials also denied the report.
